name: necrotic head
description: The severed head of a zombie necromancer.  Its eyes still roll in its head and its jaws snap menacingly.

name: mutagenic glob
description: A gelatinous glob of mutagen.

//: uncontained so it can bleed to the ground.
name: honey
description: Honey, that stuff bees make.

name.str_pl: copies of Hacking Robots for Fun & Profit

description: A book on illegally obtaining, reprogramming, and modifying robots.  It has lots of helpful step-by-step guides and example blueprints.
A magazine about building and altering your own robots.

name: AI core
description: A computer module for controlling robots.

name: surgery module
description: A microsurgery module for a medical robot.

name: pharmaceutical module
description: A pharmaceutical fabricating module for a medical robot.

name: integral paintball gun
description: A high-powered paintball module used for safely testing robots or training soldiers.
A robot crafting assistant.  Useable in its current state as a portable workbench, or deployable as a traveling companion.

name: light auto armor
description: A set of light power armor fitted with an AI core for automated use.  Activate it to deploy the robot or disassemble it to use as armor.

name: basic auto armor
description: A set of light power armor fitted with an AI core for automated use.  Activate it to deploy the robot or disassemble it to use as armor.

name: heavy auto armor
description: A set of light power armor fitted with an AI core for automated use.  Activate it to deploy the robot or disassemble it to use as armor.

name: inactive hack
description: This is an inactive manhack.  Manhacks are fist-sized robots that fly through the air.  They are covered with whirring blades and attack by throwing themselves against their target.  Use this item to reprogram and activate the manhack.  Electronics and computer skill determines if the targeting matrix is reprogrammed successfully.

name: inactive floating lantern
description: An inactive floating lantern, a fist-sized robots that flies through the air and illuminates its surroundings with bright LEDs.  The lantern is non aggressive and has no means of attack.  Activate this item to deploy the salvaged robot.

use_action.friendly_msg: The floating lantern flies from your hand and lights up the area!

name: inactive distract-o-hack
description: An inactive distract-o-hack, a fist-sized robot that flies through the air emitting noise, smoke, and sparks.  The salvaged robot has no weapons, but will harass hostile targets to draw their attention.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.  It cannot be recovered once activated.

use_action.friendly_msg: The distract-o-hack flies from your hand and begins sparking!

name: inactive arson hack
description: An inactive arson hack, a fist-sized robot that flies through the air chaotically spreading deadly fires.  The salvaged robot has no weapons, but will emit intermittent bursts of flame as it moves toward hostile targets.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.  It cannot be recovered once activated.

use_action.friendly_msg: The arson hack flies from your hand!  Get clear!
use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the arson hack!  Run!

name: inactive spore hack
description: An inactive spore hack, a fist-sized robot that flies through the air spreading alien contaminants.  The robot will dust hostile targets, and intermittently cover the terrain with puffs of fungal spores.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

use_action.friendly_msg: The spore hack flies from your hand!

name: inactive water turret
description: An inactive watercannon defense turret.  Up to 1000 units of water will be automatically loaded from your inventory into the turret upon activation.  Place the turret and it will ID you as friendly with its advanced IFF software.  There is no safety manual.

name: inactive floating heater
description: A salvaged eyebot repurposed into a floating space heater.  It emits a constant jet of warm air to heat an enclosed space.  It is non-aggressive and has no weapons systems.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive floating furnace
description: A salvaged eyebot repurposed into a floating space heater.  It emits a constant jet of dangerously hot air to heat an enclosed space.  It is non-aggressive and has no weapons systems.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive burning eye
description: A salvaged eyebot refitted with a laser weapon which it will use on hostile targets.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive blob breeder
description: A salvaged utility robot converted into a mobile incubator for the alien blob.  It is non aggressive and has no weapon systems.  You can activate this item to deploy the robot and begin the incubation process, but you probably shouldn't.

name: inactive slime breeder
description: A salvaged utility robot converted into a mobile incubator for the alien blob, and upgraded to only produce friendly slimes.  It is non aggressive and has no weapon systems.  You can activate this item to deploy the robot and begin the incubation process.

name: inactive digestron
description: A salvaged utility robot converted into an automated vacuum cleaner.  It will suck stray items off the ground and dissolve them with its internal acid reserves.  It is non aggressive and has no weapon systems.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive bee-bot
description: A salvaged utility robot converted into an ambulatory bee hive that periodically removes and delivers segments of fresh honey comb.  It protects the insect colony with a mechanical crossbow mounted to its chassis.  Activate this item, with wooden bolts in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot.

name: inactive assassin robot
description: A salvaged medical robot repurposed into a murder machine.  It will attack hostile targets with a set of blades and a toxic needle.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive elixirator
description: A salvaged medibot with its internal pharma-fabricators repurposed to produce mutagen.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive party bot
description: A salvaged medibot stuffed with marijuana, covered in multicolored blinking lights, and programmed to dance.  Activate this item to get the party started.

name: inactive rat snatcher
description: A salvaged skitterbot repurposed for hunting small game.  It attacks targets with pincers and an integrated tazer.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive grab-bot
description: A salvaged skitterbot repurposed to grab onto and immobilize enemies.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive pest hunter
description: A salvaged skitterbot refitted with an 8mm integrated firearm.  Activate this item, with ammo in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot.

name: inactive necrotic cyborg
description: A salvaged cyborg refitted with the head of a zombie necromancer.  The animate head retains some of its ability to revive zombies.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive junkyard cowboy
description: A salvaged defense robot refitted with a shotgun and two circular buzzsaws.  Activate this item, with ammo in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot.

name: inactive shortcircuit samurai
description: A salvaged defense robot refitted with an integrated tazer and two electrified blades.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive slapdash paladin
description: A salvaged defense robot refitted with a homemade flamethrower and two searing hot blades.  Activate this item, with gasoline in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot… preferably far from anything flammable

name: inactive military robot
description: An unpowered military robot fitted with an integrated 7.62 firearm and electric prod.  Activate this item, with ammo in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot.

name: inactive robo-guardian
description: A salvaged military robot refitted with a pair of integrated 9mm firearms.  Activate this item, with ammo in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot.

name: inactive robote deluxe
//: the extra E makes it European.
description: A diamond-studded gold-plated robot armed with a pair of integrated 9mm firearms.  An opulent luxury-bot suitable for those who wish to survive the apocalypse in style.  Activate this item, with ammo in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot.

name: inactive robo-protector
description: A salvaged military robot refitted with an integrated 5.56mm rifle.  Activate this item, with ammo in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot.

name: inactive robo-defender
description: A salvaged military robot refitted with an integrated 50bmg rifle.  Activate this item, with ammo in your inventory, to load and deploy the robot.
A salvaged advanced robot transformed into a luminous beacon of destruction.  It attacks hostile targets with its two integral lasers and blinding flashes.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive bitter spinster
description: A salvaged military robot transformed into a caustic monster.  An internal acid fermenter feeds a ranged glob spitter and sprayer.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive chainsaw horror
description: A salvaged chickenwalker modified into a horrific monster adorned with skulls and spikes.  It attacks hostile targets with a pair of whirring chainsaws and a deafening sound system.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive screeching terror
description: A salvaged chickenwalker modified into a horrific monster adorned with skulls and spikes.  It attacks hostile targets with a pair of piston-driven lances and a deafening sound system.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive hooked nightmare
description: A salvaged chickenwalker modified into a horrific monster adorned with skulls and spikes.  It attacks hostile targets with a pair of spinning hooks on chains and a deafening sound system.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive fist king
description: A salvaged tankbot refitted with a pair of powerful pneumatic hammers which it uses to crush anything in its way, including buildings.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.

name: inactive atomic sultan
description: A salvaged tankbot refitted with a pair of powerful pneumatic hammers which it uses to crush anything in its way, including buildings.  Activate this item to deploy the robot.
